desc: Handcrafted fiber goodness made with love of all things timeworn and earthy. Hand woven yarn from local sheeps and goats. Wash, dye, spin and then knit or crochet homespun yarn into stylish accessories as well as encourage others to be creative. American made!

layout.text:
Handcrafted fiber goodness made
with love of all things timeworn and earthy.
